Ingredients.1: 2 large  unpeeled navel oranges, each cut into 4 wedges

Ingredients.5: 0.25 teaspoon Sriracha sauce, or more to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.

Directions.2: Place orange wedges onto the prepared baking sheet. Mix honey, olive oil, thyme, and Sriracha sauce together in a small bowl. Brush enough mixture onto orange wedges to coat. Set remaining mixture aside for basting.

Directions.3: Roast oranges in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, basting once halfway through.

Directions.4: Remove from the oven and immediately sprinkle wedges lightly with coarse sea salt. Serve warm or at room temperature.
